original: @151a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @151a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bha ba sam kr'anti /
analyzed: bha ba sam kr'anti /
translated: Bhav-samkranti

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: srid pa 'pho ba /
analyzed: srid pa 'pho ba /
translated: Srid pa 'pho ba

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri

original: dngos po med pas skye ba med //
analyzed: dngos po med pas skye ba med //
translated: Non-entity is non-arising

original: dngos po med pa de la ni //
analyzed: dngos po med pa de la ni //
translated: In that non-entity

original: skye ba blangs pa srid pa yin //
analyzed: skye ba blangs pa srid pa yin //
translated: Taking birth is existence

original: rtag tu dngos po yod bsam pa //
analyzed: rtag tu dngos po yod bsam pa //
translated: Constantly thinking of existent entities

original: de ltar bsam pa 'khrul ba yin//
analyzed: de ltar bsam pa 'khrul ba yin//
translated: Such thinking is deluded

original: nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba //
translated: Like a sky-flower

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos nyid la //
translated: In the dharmata equal to space

original: de la skyes pa mkha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: de la skyes pa mkha' dang mnyam //
translated: Birth in that is equal to space

original: rang bzhin thams cad mkha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: rang bzhin thams cad mkha' dang mnyam //
translated: The nature of all is equal to space

original: de ltar mkhas pas rtogs par bya //
analyzed: de ltar mkhas pas rtogs par bya //
translated: The wise should realize it thusüîΩNo cause, no effect,üîΩNo entity of karma,

original: rgyu med 'bras bu med pa dang // las kyi dngos po med pa dang // dngos po thams cad 'di ltar med //
analyzed: rgyu med 'bras bu med pa dang // las kyi dngos po med pa dang // dngos po thams cad 'di ltar med //
translated: All entities are thus non-existentüîΩThis world, the next world,

original: 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dang // skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dang // skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of non-arising

original: de las gzhan ni skye bar byed //
analyzed: de las gzhan ni skye bar byed //
translated: Other than that, it produces birth

original: mo gsham bu yi bu la yang //
analyzed: mo gsham bu yi bu la yang //
translated: Even the son of a barren woman

original: de la su ni skye bar mdzod //
analyzed: de la su ni skye bar mdzod //
translated: Who is there to be born?

original: 'jig rten pa 'di sngar ma skyes //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa 'di sngar ma skyes //
translated: This world did not exist before.

original: de las sus kyang byas pa med//
analyzed: de las sus kyang byas pa med//
translated: No one has made it.

original: don med 'khor ba'i 'jig rten na //
analyzed: don med 'khor ba'i 'jig rten na //
translated: In this meaningless world of cyclic existence,

original: sgyu ma'i grong khyer 'khyams pa bzhin //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i grong khyer 'khyams pa bzhin //
translated: Like a person wandering in a magical city,

original: yod med gang yang ming bstan pa //
analyzed: yod med gang yang ming bstan pa //
translated: Neither existence nor nonexistence is taught.

original: chos nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o /
translated: This is the first chapter, the chapter on reality.

original: // / rnam rtog las ni 'jig rten 'byung //üîΩrnam rtog de las sems kyang 'byung //
analyzed: // / rnam rtog las ni 'jig rten 'byung // rnam rtog de las sems kyang 'byung //
translated: The world arises from conceptualization,üîΩAnd the mind arises from conceptualization.

original: sems las lus kyang byung ba na //
analyzed: sems las lus kyang byung ba na //
translated: The body also arises from the mind.

original: lus la brtag par gyis tsam na //
analyzed: lus la brtag par gyis tsam na //
translated: When you examine the body,

original: gzugs dang tshor ba ming dang ni //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba ming dang ni //
translated: Form, feeling, name, and so on

original: dngos po stong nyid med pa yin //
analyzed: dngos po stong nyid med pa yin //
translated: Are empty of entity and nonexistence.

original: 'du byed dngos po de yang med //
analyzed: 'du byed dngos po de yang med //
translated: Even those conditioned entities do not exist.

original: sems kyis brtag pa gang yang med //
analyzed: sems kyis brtag pa gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing to be examined by the mind.

original: sems ni rtog med ngo bo yin //
analyzed: sems ni rtog med ngo bo yin //
translated: The mind is of the nature of nonconceptuality.

original: phung po lnga stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: phung po lnga stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter, the chapter on the emptiness of the five aggregates.

original: // / sems med pas na chos kyang med //
analyzed: // / sems med pas na chos kyang med //
translated: Since there is no mind, there are no phenomena.

original: de ltar lus dang khams kyang med //
analyzed: de ltar lus dang khams kyang med //
translated: Thus there is no body and no elements.

original: de ltar gnyis med lam gyi ni //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis med lam gyi ni //
translated: Thus, the reality of the nondual path

original: de nyid du ni rab tu bshad //
analyzed: de nyid du ni rab tu bshad //
translated: is explained in this way.

original: 'di dag thams cad rten med yin //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rten med yin //
translated: All of these are without support,

original: rten med du ni rab tu bshad //
analyzed: rten med du ni rab tu bshad //
translated: and are explained as being without support.

original: blo ni rten med @151b byas nas ni //
analyzed: blo ni rten med @151b byas nas ni //
translated: Having made the mind without support,

original: de yang rten med 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de yang rten med 'byung ba'o //
translated: that also arises without support.

original: shes rab bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third chapter on the explanation of wisdom.üîΩGenerosity, discipline, patience,

original: // / sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab sogs //
analyzed: // / sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab sogs //
translated: effort, concentration, wisdom, and so on,

original: rtag tu de byas las kyis ni //
analyzed: rtag tu de byas las kyis ni //
translated: always performing those actions,

original: myur ba'i 'dus su byang chub thob //
analyzed: myur ba'i 'dus su byang chub thob //
translated: quickly attain enlightenment.

original: thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth chapter on the explanation of methods.üîΩThe nectar that arises from

original: // / thabs dang shes rab gnas pa la //üîΩde las skye ba'i bdud rtsi ni //
analyzed: // / thabs dang shes rab gnas pa la // de las skye ba'i bdud rtsi ni //
translated: the abode of method and wisdom

original: bla ma'i bka' yis zad pa med //
analyzed: bla ma'i bka' yis zad pa med //
translated: is inexhaustible by the guru's word.

original: myur ba'i dus la rnyed nas ni //
analyzed: myur ba'i dus la rnyed nas ni //
translated: Having attained it in a short time,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa the tshom med //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt about omniscience.

original: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam yin //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam yin //
translated: All of this is merely a name,

original: ming gi khams su rab tu gnas //
analyzed: ming gi khams su rab tu gnas //
translated: and it is well-established in the realm of names.

original: bshad byed de yang gud du yang //
analyzed: bshad byed de yang gud du yang //
translated: That which is to be explained is also elsewhere,üîΩand it is also elsewhere.

original: bshad bya de yang gang na yod //
analyzed: bshad bya de yang gang na yod //
translated: Where is the subject to be explained?

original: gang las gang byung ming de ni //
analyzed: gang las gang byung ming de ni //
translated: The name of that which arises from something

original: gang las gang byung chos de rnams //
analyzed: gang las gang byung chos de rnams //
translated: Is the dharma that arises from that.

original: de ni med par 'gro ba yin //
analyzed: de ni med par 'gro ba yin //
translated: That which goes to nonexistence

original: chos de med pas chos nyid yin //
analyzed: chos de med pas chos nyid yin //
translated: Is the dharmatƒÅ of the nonexistent dharma.

original: ma byung ming ni stong nyid yin //
analyzed: ma byung ming ni stong nyid yin //
translated: The name of the nonarisen is emptiness.

original: de yang ming du grub pa med //
analyzed: de yang ming du grub pa med //
translated: That also is not established as a name.

original: chos rnams thams cad ming med pa //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ming med pa //
translated: All dharmas are nameless.

original: ming med du ni shin tu gsal //
analyzed: ming med du ni shin tu gsal //
translated: Namelessness is very clear.

original: de ltar rnam rtog gang byung ba //
analyzed: de ltar rnam rtog gang byung ba //
translated: In that way, whatever conceptuality arises

original: de yang stong nyid rnam rtog yin //
analyzed: de yang stong nyid rnam rtog yin //
translated: Is also the conceptuality of emptiness.

original: mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs de ni //
analyzed: mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs de ni //
translated: The form seen by the eye

original: de nyid mkhyen pas yod par bshad //
analyzed: de nyid mkhyen pas yod par bshad //
translated: Is explained as existent by the one who knows suchness.

original: brdzun gyi nga rgyal 'jig rten pa //
analyzed: brdzun gyi nga rgyal 'jig rten pa //
translated: The pride of lies is worldly

original: kun rdzob sems pa brten pa yin //
analyzed: kun rdzob sems pa brten pa yin //
translated: And is the support of the relative mind.

original: rten 'brel 'dzom pas mthong ba gang //
analyzed: rten 'brel 'dzom pas mthong ba gang //
translated: Whatever is seen through the convergence of dependent origination

original: der snang ston pa 'dren pa yin //
analyzed: der snang ston pa 'dren pa yin //
translated: Is the appearance of that, the guide, the teacher.

original: 'dzin pa spyod pa'i sa yod par //
analyzed: 'dzin pa spyod pa'i sa yod par //
translated: The stage of conduct of grasping is existent,

original: don dam pa yi blo ma yin //
analyzed: don dam pa yi blo ma yin //
translated: But it is not the mind of ultimate reality.

original: mig gis gzugs ni mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs ni mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: The eye does not see form,

original: sems chos de yang yod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sems chos de yang yod mi 'gyur //
translated: And the mind and phenomena also do not exist.

original: gang snang thams cad brdzun du bshad //
analyzed: gang snang thams cad brdzun du bshad //
translated: All that appears is explained to be false.

original: 'jig rten pas ni gang spangs pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten pas ni gang spangs pa //
translated: What is abandoned by the worldly

original: de ni don dam yin par bshad //
analyzed: de ni don dam yin par bshad //
translated: is explained to be the ultimate.

original: bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter, called Critique of the Two Truths.

original: // / dbu ma srid pa'i 'pho ba zhes bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / dbu ma srid pa'i 'pho ba zhes bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Madhyamaka called Transmigration through Existence, composed by ƒÄrya NƒÅgƒÅrjuna, is complete.
